releaseNotes:
v3.0.0
 - Fix a bug that caused all commands to always be sent to device endpoint 0x01 (ups!)
 - Add possibility to show command names in plain english
 - "Revelio" now shows all records, not just the ones that fit in a single Zigbee message
author: Dan Danache (@dandanache)

drivers.name: Knockturn Alley
drivers.description: Skulking around Knockturn Alley? Dodgy place. Don't want no one to see you there.
